**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name=">" Script="loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") 'NLSapp.MessageBox(loanref)
strSQL2 = "select loan_number from loanacct where acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'" loannumber = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL2)
strSQL3 = "select open_maturity_date from loanacct where acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'" maturity = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL3)
strSQL4 = "select first_principal_payment_date from loanacct_payment where acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'" FirstPayment = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL4)
TotalPayments = NLSapp.AmortizeLoanInMemory(maturity, loanref)
NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF47",TotalPayments NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF48",FirstPayment NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF49",maturity NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF50",loannumber
NLSApp.SaveScreen()"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**NLSapp.ClearErrorString() LoanNo = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") WCAgent = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF37") WCdate = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF38") WCStatus = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF44")
addnotes = InputBox("Additional Info?" & chr(13) & "Leave blank if nothing to add." , "WC Status Notes", defaultdate,4550,4550)
if len(addnotes) = 0 Then addnotes = "N/A" end if
notes = "Additional Notes:" & chr(13) &addnotes commenthd = "Welcome Call completed." & chr(13)
XMLA = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?><NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" XMLB = "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & LoanNo & """>" XMLC = "<LOANCOMMENTS Comment=""" & commenthd & WCStatus & chr(13) & notes & """ Category=""SERVICING NOTES"" CommentDescription=""WC Activity""/></LOAN></NLS>"
xmlstrng = XMLA & XMLB & XMLC
'NLSApp.MessageBox(xmlstrng)
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
ImportXML(xmlstrng)**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name=">" Script="strSQL1 = "select max(acctrefno) from loanacct" loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") 'NLSapp.MessageBox(loanref)
strSQL2 = "select loan_number from loanacct where acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'" loannumber = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL2)
strSQL3 = "select open_maturity_date from loanacct where acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'" maturity = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL3)
strSQL4 = "select first_principal_payment_date from loanacct_payment where acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'" FirstPayment = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL4)
TotalPayments = NLSapp.AmortizeLoanInMemory(maturity, loanref)
NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF47",TotalPayments NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF48",FirstPayment NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF49",maturity NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF50",loannumber
NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF44", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(155,155,155), false
NLSapp.SaveScreen()"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'###UDF41(CPlus) 'When Field Changes (Start a Loan Modification Request) 'Creates a loan mod TASK
'LOAN variables loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") loannumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") getmodtype = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF41") loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
'Task variables templateno = TEMPLATE_NUM_LOAN_MODIFICATIONS_II defaultstatusno = TEMPLATE_STATUS_STARTED queue = TEMPLATE_QUEUE_MODIFICATIONS
'Change Start a Loan Modification Request field (UDF41) back to default "Choose an Option" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF41", "Choose an Option" NLSApp.RefreshScreen()
If Not getmodtype = "Choose an Option" Then If addloanMod(getmodtype, loanrefno, loanstatus) = "" Then End If End If NLSApp.SaveScreen()
Function addloanMod(modtype, loanrefno, status)
'TASK variables currate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(7,2),current_interest_rate))+'%' from loanacct where acctrefno = " & loanrefno) currpmt = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT '$' + convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(9,2), next_payment_total_amount)) from loanacct_payment where acctrefno = " & loanrefno) currdate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select convert(char(10),getdate(),111)") currdatetime = NOW() hardship = "Choose an Option"
'User input for modification requestor Optins a. borrower, b. co-borrower, c. 3rd party requestpromt = "Who is requesting the " & getmodtype & "?" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "A - Borrower" & chr(13) & "B - Co-Borrower" & chr(13) & "C - Third party" requestorcode = InputBox(requestpromt, "Requestor", "A")
'Borrower/Co-borrower detail sql lookups borrowerlookupsql = "select mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + city + ' ' + state + ', ' + zip from cif c, loanacct l where l.cifno = c.cifno and l.acctrefno = " & loanrefno coborrowerlookupsql = "select mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + city + ' ' + state + ', ' + zip from cif c, cif_loan_relationship clr where clr.cifno = c.cifno and clr.acctrefno = " & loanrefno
'Previous approved deferral lookup prevdeflookupsql = "SELECT count(t.task_refno) from task t, task_detail td where t.task_refno = td.task_refno AND t.status_code_id = 8 AND t.task_template_no = 7 AND td.userdef01 = 'Deferral' AND t.NLS_refno = " & loanrefno
Select Case requestorcode Case "A", "a" requestor = "Borrower" requestordetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(borrowerlookupsql) Case "B", "b" requestor = "Co-Borrower" requestordetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(coborrowerlookupsql) If requestordetail = "" Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Co-Borrower information cannot be located." & chr(13) & "Please validate that Co-borrower exists and Retry.") NLSApp.MessageBox("Operation Canceled.") Exit Function End If Case "C", "c" requestor = "Third_Party (See Notes)" requestordetail = "ENTER 3rd Party details here." Case "" NLSApp.MessageBox("Modification Canceled.") Exit Function Case Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Invalid Selection." & chr(13) & "Please Try Again.") Exit Function End Select
SELECT CASE getmodtype CASE "Deferral" 'Look up the # of previously approved deferrals prevdefs = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(prevdeflookupsql) CASE "SCRA" 'auto-pop udf2 with SCRA hardship = "SCRA" END SELECT
'TASK OBJECT CREATION If status = "ACTIVE" Then Set Task = NLSApp.Tasks.New(templateno) NLSApp.Tasks.BeginTransaction Task.StatusCodeID = defaultstatusno Task.WorkQueueCodeID = queue Task.NLSRefno = loanrefno Task.UDF1 = modtype Task.UDF2 = hardship Task.UDF9 = prevdefs Task.UDF10 = currpmt Task.UDF12 = currdate Task.UDF14 = currate Task.UDF18 = requestor Task.UDF23 = currdate Task.UDF25 = requestordetail
If (Task.Save = -1) Then NLSApp.Tasks.RollbackTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Task not created.") addloanMod = -1 Else NLSApp.Tasks.CommitTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Loan Modification TASK created." & Chr(13) & "Please go the the Task Tab to complete the modification record.") addloanMod = "" End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("The Loan must be in ACTIVE status to add a Modification task") End If
End Function**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

<UDF StaticLeftPos="828" StaticTopPos="156" StaticWidth="112" StaticHeight="20" FieldLeftPos="946" FieldTopPos="156" FieldWidth="276" FieldHeight="20" TabOrder="-1" ScreenHeight="597" ScreenWidth="1223" ZOrder="33" ReadOnly="0"/>

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Activate CnD" Script="'FFLS-379 Add Cease and Desist Button ' 1. Remove loan statements from loan setup ' 2. Remove email address from Communication Preferences ' 3. Remove all alerts from Communication Preferences ' 4. Obfuscate borrower and co-borrower email to [borrower@ffn1.com]@cnd (for tracking) 'FFLS-656 Remove Scripting that Disables Statements for CND ' 1. Comment out SQL update lines that effect communication preferences
If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Are Sure you want to Activate a Cease and Desist for this loan?" & chr(13) & "This can only be undone manually.") Then 'Set variables loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") cifnumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") cocifnumber = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT c2.cifnumber , c2.email, c2.email2 from loanacct l, cif c2, cif_loan_relationship clr where c2.cifno = clr.cifno and l.acctrefno = clr.acctrefno and clr.acctrefno = " & loanrefno) email1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() email2 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
'1-3 SQL to update loan setup and communication cndsqlupdates = "SELECT 0; " & _ "UPDATE loanacct_setup SET statement1_code = 0, statement2_code = 0, late_fee_code = 0 WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & chr(13) & _ "--DELETE from LoanCommunicationAddress WHERE LoanCommunicationPreferencesID IN (SELECT LoanCommunicationPreferencesID FROM LoanCommunicationPreferences WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & ")" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE LoanCommunicationPreferences SET LateNoticeOptionFlags = 0 from LoanCommunicationPreferences WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE loanacct SET collection_officer_no = 0 WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno
'Run UPDATES NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(cndsqlupdates)
'Add Loan Status change to "CEASE AND DESIST ACTIVE" loanxmlstring = "<NLS><LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & loanrefno & _ """><LOANSTATUSES Operation=""ADD"" LoanStatusCode=""CEASE AND DESIST ACTIVE"" EffectiveDate=""" & NOW() & """/></LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "<CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cifnumber & """ EmailAddress1=""" & email1 & "@cnd"" EmailAddress2=""" & email2 & "@cnd""/></NLS>"
'4 Updates to obfuscate email addresses ImportXML(loanxmlstring) If Not cocifnumber = "" Then cocifxmlstring = "<NLS><CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cocifnumber & """ EmailAddress1=""" & email1 & "@cnd"" EmailAddress2=""" & email2 & "@cnd""/></NLS>" ImportXML(cocifxmlstring) End if
NLSApp.RefreshScreen() Else NLSApp.MessageBox("CnD Canceled.") End if"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**CurrentDate = Now() NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF38", CurrentDate
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
LoanNo = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") WCAgent = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF37") WCdate = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF38") WCStatus = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF44")
If not right(WCAgent,9) = "COMPLETED" THEN
notes = "Additional Notes:" & chr(13) &addnotes commenthd = "Welcome Call Attempt " & right(WCAgent ,2)
XMLA = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?><NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" XMLB = "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & LoanNo & """>" XMLC = "<LOANCOMMENTS Comment=""" & commenthd & """ Category=""SERVICING NOTES"" CommentDescription=""WC Activity""/></LOAN></NLS>"
xmlstrng = XMLA & XMLB & XMLC
'NLSApp.MessageBox(xmlstrng)
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
ImportXML(xmlstrng) End if**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**UserID = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo( )

NLSapp.LoadComboList 1, "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF37", SQLtxt**###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'Script to update CIF based on limiit sharing box being checked or not checked.
NLSApp.SetFocus ("LOAN_NUMBER") LoanNo = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") loanref= NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") CIFNo1 =NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER")
strSQL1 ="SELECT count(acctrefno) FROM cif_loan_relationship WHERE acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'"
COCIFYN = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL1)
strSQL2 ="SELECT cif.cifnumber " & _ "FROM cif_loan_relationship clr, cif cif " & _ "WHERE clr.cifno = cif.cifno " & _ "AND relationship_code_id = '1' " & _ "AND clr.acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'"
CIFNo2 = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL2)
If NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF35") = "CHECK" THEN LimistShareYN = "1" ELSE LimistShareYN = "0" END IF
XMLA = "<NLS>" XMLB = "<CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=" & chr(34) & CIFNo1 & chr(34) & " Entity=""INDIVIDUAL""><CIFDETAIL CIFDetail2=" & chr(34) & LimistShareYN & chr(34) & "/>" XMLC = "</CIF>" &CHR(13) & "</NLS>"
xmlstrng1 = XMLA & CHR(13) & XMLB & CHR(13) & XMLC
ImportXML(xmlstrng1)
If Not COCIFYN = 0 Then XMLD = "<CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=" & chr(34) & CIFNo2 & chr(34) & " Entity=""INDIVIDUAL""><CIFDETAIL CIFDetail2=" & chr(34) & LimistShareYN & chr(34) & "/>" xmlstrng2 = XMLA & CHR(13) & XMLD & CHR(13) & XMLC
ImportXML(xmlstrng2)
End If
'NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF43",xmlstrng & CHR(13) &CIFNo1
Function ImportXML(xml) NLSApp.ClearErrorString()
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then NLSApp.MessageBox(xml & CHR(13) & NLSApp.GetErrorString()) End If ImportXML = NLSApp.GetErrorString() & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else ' NLSApp.MessageBox("ECOA Status Updated.") ImportXML = "" End If End Function
NLSApp.SaveScreen()**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

<UDF StaticLeftPos="426" StaticTopPos="409" StaticWidth="109" StaticHeight="20" FieldLeftPos="542" FieldTopPos="409" FieldWidth="277" FieldHeight="20" TabOrder="-1" ScreenHeight="597" ScreenWidth="1223" ZOrder="51" ReadOnly="0"/>

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="BK-Notice" Script="'###Loan Detail 1 UDF33 'on Button click option selection 'Creates a Bankruptcy TASK
loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
'ACTIVE BK TASK lookup activeBKtsksql = "select count(t.task_refno) from task t, task_template tt, task_status_codes tsc" & chr(13) & _ "where t.task_template_no = tt.task_template_no and t.status_code_id = tsc.status_code_id" & chr(13) & _ "and tt.task_template_name in ('BANKRUPTCY')" & chr(13) & _ "and status_code not in ('BK-DISMISSED','BK-COMPLETED','BK-INVALID','BK-DISSCHARGED') and nls_refno = " & loanrefno
activeBKtsk = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(activeBKtsksql)
'If there are no active BK tasks(Statuses TBD) process request If activeBKtsk = 0 Then NLSApp.SaveScreen() addBKTask (loanrefno) Else NLSApp.Messagebox("Canceling request." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "This loan already has an active bankruptcy notice in the processing queue." & chr(13) & "Please contact the Bankrupcy Administration group.") End if
'------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'SUB Sub addBKTask (loanrefno) 'LOAN variables loanstatus1 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") loanstatus2 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS_SECONDARY") loannumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") Userno = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo( )
'Task variables templateno = TEMPLATE_NUM_BANKRUPTCY defaulttskstatus = TEMPLATE_STATUS_BK_NOTICE workqueue = TEMPLATE_QUEUE_BANKRUPTCY
'Who is supplying the notice? sourcepromt = "Who is giving the Bankruptcy Notice?" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "A - Attorney" & chr(13) & _ "B - Borrower and or Co-Borrower" & chr(13) & "C - Correspondence" & chr(13) & "D - FirstSweep" & chr(13) & "E - Other" sourcecode = noticesource(UCase(InputBox(sourcepromt, "BK-Notice Source", "A"))) If sourcecode = -1 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Notice Canceled or Invalid Selection." & chr(13) & "Please Try Again.") Exit sub End if 'Atty name and Phone? attypromt1 = "Enter The Attorney's name" & chr(13) & "(Optional if you have the Court Case#.)" & chr(13)& chr(13) &_ "Hit [OK] if you have the Case# but no attorney Information." & chr(13) & "If you do not know either, hit [Cancel]." attypromt2 = "Enter The Attorney's phone number." & chr(13) & "(10 digits only.)" attypromt3 = "Please enter the court case#." & chr(13) & "(Optional if you have entered the attorney's name.)" & chr(13)& chr(13) &_ "If you do not have it hit [OK] to proceed or [Cancel] to quit." attypromt4 = "A valid phone# is required when an attorney name is supplied." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Entry MUST be 10 digits and all numeric."
attypromt1 = "Enter The Attorney's name and Click [OK]" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "OR" & chr(13)& chr(13) &_ "Click [OK] if you only know the Case#." & chr(13) & "If you do not know either, Click [Cancel]." attypromt2 = "Enter The Attorney's phone number." & chr(13) & "(10 digits only.)" attypromt3 = "Enter the court Case# and Click [OK]." & chr(13)& chr(13) &_ "If you do not have it, Click [Cancel]." attypromt4 = "A valid phone# is required when an attorney name is supplied." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Entry MUST be 10 digits and all numeric."
'Either Attorney name or case# is required or the process is aborted attyname = InputBox(attypromt1, "Attorney", "Enter Attorney")
If not attyname = "" and not attyname = "Enter Attorney" Then
Do validphone = 0 attyphone = InputBox(attypromt2, "Attorney Phone", "#########") if IsNumeric(attyphone) = True and len(attyphone) = 10 Then validphone = 1 Else
If MsgBox (attypromt4, 21,"Invalid Phone Number!") = 2 Then 'If user selects [Cancel] NLSApp.Messagebox("Canceling.") Exit Sub End If End if Loop until validphone = 1
caseno = InputBox(attypromt3, "Case #", "")
'combine all attorney info into a formatted text string AttyInfo = attyname & chr(13) & " (" & left(attyphone,3) & ") " & Mid(attyphone,4,3) & _ "-" & right(attyphone,4) Else If attyname = "" Then NLSApp.Messagebox("Canceling.") Exit Sub Else caseno = InputBox(attypromt3, "Case #", "") End if
End if
If attyname = "Enter Attorney" and caseno = "" Then NLSApp.Messagebox("Attorney Name and Phone Number OR Case # are required to accept a bankruptcy notice and start the process." & chr(13) & chr(13) &"Canceling.") Exit Sub End if
'Get loan borrower and co-borrower detail functions borrowerinfo = getborrowercifdetails (loanrefno) & getborrowerphndetails (loanrefno) coborrowerinfo = getcoborrowercifdetails (loanrefno) & getcoborrowerphndetails (loanrefno) If coborrowerinfo = "" Then coborrowerinfo = "N/A" End if
'Build the Task If not buildBKTask (loanrefno,templateno,defaulttskstatus,workqueue,Userno,sourcecode,borrowerinfo,coborrowerinfo,AttyInfo,caseno) = -1 Then 'Add loan status NLSApp.SetSecondaryLoanStatus loanrefno,NOW(),LOAN_STATUS_BK_NOTICE,"ADD" NLSApp.RefreshScreen() End if
End Sub
'------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'FUNCTIONS
Function getborrowercifdetails (refno) 'Looks up loan primary contact details (required) lookupdetailssql = "select 'Contact Number: ' + c.cifnumber + char(13) + 'Entry Date: ' + convert(char(11),c.setupdate) + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'Name: ' + c.firstname1 + ' ' +c.lastname1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "case when street_address2 is null Then '' Else street_address2 + char(13) end + " & chr(13) & _ "city + ', ' + state + ' ' + zip + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'EMAIL1 :' + case when c.email is null then '' else c.email end + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'EMAIL2 :' + case when c.email2 is null then '' else c.email end + char(13) " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, cif c " & chr(13) & _ "where l.cifno = c.cifno " & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = " & refno
getborrowercifdetails = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupdetailssql) End function
Function getcoborrowercifdetails (refno) 'Looks up loan secondary contact details if they exist. Returns NULL if not lookupdetailssql = "select 'Contact Number: ' + c.cifnumber + char(13) + 'Entry Date: ' + convert(char(11),c.setupdate) + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'Name: ' + c.firstname1 + ' ' +c.lastname1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "case when street_address2 is null Then '' Else street_address2 + char(13) end + " & chr(13) & _ "city + ', ' + state + ' ' + zip + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'EMAIL1 :' + case when c.email is null then '' else c.email end + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'EMAIL2 :' + case when c.email2 is null then '' else c.email end + char(13) " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, cif c, cif_loan_relationship clr " & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = clr.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and clr.cifno = c.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = " & refno
getcoborrowercifdetails = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupdetailssql) End function
Function getborrowerphndetails (refno) 'Looks up loan secondary contact details if they exist. Returns NULL if not lookupdetailssql = "select distinct phone_raw + " & chr(13) & _ "case when primary_flag = 1 Then ' Primary' Else ' ' + (case when comments is null then '' else comments end) end,primary_flag" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, cif c" & chr(13) & _ "left outer join cif_phone_nums cp" & chr(13) & _ "on c.cifno = cp.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "where l.cifno = c.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "and len(cp.phone_raw) in (10,12,11)" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = " & refno & chr(13) & _ "order by primary_flag desc"
phoneheader = chr(13) & "Phone Number(s)/Type" currphn = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupdetailssql)
If not IsNull(currphn) = True Then Do until currphn = "***END OF RESULT***"
phonelist = phonelist & chr(13) & currphn currphn = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop Else phonelist = "N/A" End if getborrowerphndetails = phoneheader & phonelist
End function
Function getcoborrowerphndetails (refno) 'Looks up loan secondary contact details if they exist. Returns NULL if not lookupdetailssql = "select distinct phone_raw + " & chr(13) & _ "case when primary_flag = 1 Then ' Primary' Else ' ' + case when comments is null then '' else comments end end,primary_flag" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, cif c, cif_loan_relationship clr " & chr(13) & _ "left outer join cif_phone_nums cp " & chr(13) & _ "on clr.cifno = cp.cifno " & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = clr.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and clr.cifno = c.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "and len(phone_raw) in (10,12)" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = " & refno & chr(13) & _ "order by primary_flag desc"
phoneheader = chr(13) & "Phone Number(s)/Type" currphn = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupdetailssql)
If not IsNull(currphn) = True Then Do until currphn = "***END OF RESULT***"
phonelist = phonelist & chr(13) & currphn currphn = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop Else phonelist = "N/A" End if
getcoborrowerphndetails = phoneheader & phonelist End function
Function buildBKTask (refno,tasktemplateno,status,queue,uidno,source,BoInfo,CoInfo,AttyInfo,filecasealphanum) 'TASK OBJECT CREATION Set Task = NLSApp.Tasks.New(tasktemplateno) NLSApp.Tasks.BeginTransaction Task.StatusCodeID = status Task.NLSRefno = refno Task.WorkQueueCodeID = queue Task.CreatorUID = uidno Task.UDF1 = source Task.UDF4 = BoInfo Task.UDF5 = CoInfo Task.UDF22 = filecasealphanum Task.UDF23 = AttyInfo
If (Task.Save = -1) Then NLSApp.Tasks.RollbackTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Task not created.") buildBKTask = -1 Else NLSApp.Tasks.CommitTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Bankruptcy TASK created and added to BK Queue for processing.") buildBKTask = "" End If
end Function
Function noticesource(sourcecode) Select Case sourcecode Case "A" source = "Attorney" Case "B" source = "Customer" Case "C" source = "Correspondence" Case "D" source = "First Sweep" Case "E" source = "Other" Case Else source = -1 End Select noticesource = source End Function"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###**'Field Level Script----------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before Input 'After Input 'When Field Changes '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ' Detail 2 UDF45 update - This is triggered by the When Field Changes event ' ' Location of script: Loan Detail 1 UDF16(C+) and Loan Detail 1 UDF29(F+) Field label name Investor sale date ' ' Purpose: ' Designed to maintain detail2 udef45 in sync with loan ach_co set up for the purpose of assuring the webpaay portal can see the current code for each new online reqiest. ' ' Created: 07/18/2017 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History NA
class_2 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CLASS2") port = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") ACH_no = ACHCoIDUDF45(class_2,port) Curr_ACH_Co_UDF45 = NLSApp.GetField ("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF45") If ACH_no <> Curr_ACH_Co_UDF45 Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF45", ACH_no End If
'When Field Changes 'On Field Refresh 'On Initialize 'On Button click/Box check-uncheck 'Form Level Script------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before save 'Before Activate 'Before Create 'On Delete 'After Save 'After Create 'On Add Button Clicked 'Local Functions**###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Activate CnD" Script="If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Are you sure you want to Activate a Cease and Desist for this loan?" & chr(13) & "This can only be undone manually.") Then loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") cifnumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") cocifnumber = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT c2.cifnumber , c2.email, c2.email2 from loanacct l, cif c2, cif_loan_relationship clr where c2.cifno = clr.cifno and l.acctrefno = clr.acctrefno and clr.acctrefno = " & loanrefno) email1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() email2 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
cndsqlupdates = "SELECT 0; " & _ "UPDATE loanacct_setup SET statement1_code = 0, statement2_code = 0, late_fee_code = 0 WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & chr(13) & _ "DELETE from LoanCommunicationAddress WHERE LoanCommunicationPreferencesID IN (SELECT LoanCommunicationPreferencesID FROM LoanCommunicationPreferences WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & ")" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE LoanCommunicationPreferences SET StatementOptionFlags = 0, LateNoticeOptionFlags = 0 from LoanCommunicationPreferences WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE loanacct SET collection_officer_no = 40 WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(cndsqlupdates)
'Add Loan Status change to CEASE AND DESIST ACTIVE loanxmlstring = "<NLS><LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & loanrefno & _ """><LOANSTATUSES Operation=""ADD"" LoanStatusCode=""CEASE AND DESIST ACTIVE"" EffectiveDate=""" & NOW() & """/></LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "<CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cifnumber & """ EmailAddress1=""" & email1 & "@cnd"" EmailAddress2=""" & email2 & "@cnd""/></NLS>"
ImportXML(loanxmlstring) If Not cocifnumber = "" Then cocifxmlstring = "<NLS><CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cocifnumber & """ EmailAddress1=""" & email1 & "@cnd"" EmailAddress2=""" & email2 & "@cnd""/></NLS>" ImportXML(cocifxmlstring) End if NLSApp.MessageBox("Cease and Desist has been Activated for " & NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") & ".") NLSApp.RefreshScreen() Else NLSApp.MessageBox("CnD Canceled.") End if"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'Field Level Script----------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before Input 'After Input 'When Field Changes '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ' Categories update - This is triggered by the When Field Changes event ' ' Location of script: Loan Detail 1 UDF22 (C+ and F+ Portfolio) Field label name Categories ' ' Purpose: ' Designed to maintain correct communications loan pref when borrowerer and coborrower is reported deseased or BK reported or BK confirmed. ' ' Created: 04/18/2016 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History 06/30/2017 by Stanley Muhammad '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' LoanDetailudfF22Update()
Sub LoanDetailudfF22Update() loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") loancif = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") loanport = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") udf22 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF22") status = " "
lateflag = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select LateNoticeOptionFlags from LoanCommunicationPreferences where acctrefno = " & loanref) optin = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select CASE WHEN l.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN ld.userdef18 else ld.userdef17 END from loanacct_detail ld, loanacct l where l.acctrefno = ld.acctrefno and l.acctrefno = " & loanref)
If optin = 1 Then alert = " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType='LateNotice' OptionFlags='1'/> " & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>" Else alert = " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType='LateNotice' OptionFlags='3'/> " & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>" end if
If udf22 = "DECEASED CO-BORROWER" Then 'Delete co-borrower Email address from loan communication preferences loancocif = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select cifno from cif_loan_relationship where acctrefno = " & loanref) If loancocif <> "" Then coborroweremail = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT email from cif where cifno = " & loancocif) email = " <EMAILADDRESSES>" & chr(13) & _ " <EMAILADDRESS Operation='DELETE' Address='" & coborroweremail & "'/>" & chr(13) & _ " </EMAILADDRESSES>" End If End If
If udf22 = "DECEASED BORROWER" Then 'Delete borrower Email address from loan communication preferences borroweremail = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT email from cif where cifnumber = '" & loancif & "'") email = " <EMAILADDRESSES>" & chr(13) & _ " <EMAILADDRESS Operation='DELETE' Address='" & borroweremail & "'/>" & chr(13) & _ " </EMAILADDRESSES>" End If
If udf22 = "BK-AWAITING CONFIRMATION" Or udf22 = "BK-CONFIRMED" Then 'Disable printing, email and SMS options from loan communication preferences 'status = " <LOANSTATUSES Operation=""ADD"" LoanStatusCode=""DISABLESTMTS"" EffectiveDate=""" & now() & """/>" ***Future potential enhancement** alert = " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType='LateNotice' OptionFlags='0'/> " & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>"
End If
xmlstrng = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag = '1' AcctRefno ='" & loanref & "'>" & chr(13) & _ status & chr(13) & _ " <COMMUNICATION>" & chr(13) & _ email & chr(13) & _ alert & chr(13) & _ " </COMMUNICATION> " & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
ImportXML(xmlstrng)
End Sub 'When Field Changes 'On Field Refresh 'On Initialize 'On Button click/Box check-uncheck 'Form Level Script------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before save 'Before Activate 'Before Create 'On Delete 'After Save 'After Create 'On Add Button Clicked 'Local Functions **###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###** replookup()
Sub replookup() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Adds list of debt settlemtn company representatives associated with selected company for LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21 to drop down options 'in LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22. 'Triggered when LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21 field changes. '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
currco = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21") repcountsql = "select count(row_id) from cif c, cif_cif_relationship ccr where c.cifno = ccr.cifno1 and c.company = '" & currco & "'" repcount = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(repcountsql) repnamesql = "select c2.shortname from cif c, cif_cif_relationship ccr, cif c2 " & _ "where c.cifno = ccr.cifno1 and c2.cifno = ccr.cifno2 and c.company = '" & currco & "'" indexcount = 0 repname = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(repnamesql) indexx = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If len(currco) > 0 Then If len(repname) = 0 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("The company, ' " & currco & "', currently has no representatives assigned to it." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Please select another company or go to CONTACTS to add a representative.") Exit Sub End If End If
Do NLSapp.AddComboString "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", indexcount, repname
repname = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() indexx = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() indexcount = indexcount + 1 Loop While CDbl(indexcount) < CDbl(repcount)
End Sub**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**NLSapp.LoadComboList 1, "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", "select company from cif where cifnumber like '%DSC%'"**###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'Field Level Script----------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before Input 'After Input 'When Field Changes '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ' Mail Paper Statement checkbox update - This is triggered by the When Field Changes event ' ' Location of script: Loan Detail 1 UDF18 (Plus Portfolio) ' ' Purpose: ' Designed to keep the CIF MailPaperstatement check box always in sync with the loan Mail Paper Statement checkbox. ' ' Created: 04/18/20126 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History 05/26/16 By SM ' Modification History 06/26/16 By SM ' Modification History 09/25/18 By SM '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ELCommUpdate()
Sub ELCommUpdate() loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") loancif = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") loanport = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") loancifno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cast(cifno as varchar) from cif where cifnumber = '" & loancif & "'") email1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT email,email2 from cif where cifnumber = '" & loancif & "'") email2 = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() 'msgbox(loanport) If loanport = "PLUS PORTFOLIO" Then statement2 = "NONE" boxchecked = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF18") cifboxchecked = "CIFDetail7" Else statement2 = "NONE" boxchecked = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF17") cifboxchecked = "CIFDetail3" End If
If boxchecked = "CHECK" Then boxvalue = "1" OptionFlagS = "1" OptionFlagL = "1" Else If not email1 = "" Then boxvalue = "0" OptionFlagS = "2" OptionFlagL = "2" statement2 = "NONE" Else If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("NO EMAIL ADDRESS ON RECORD." & chr(10) & "You cannot end MAIL ONLY without adding an email address First." & chr(10)& chr(10) & "Do you want to add one now?") then newemail = addnewemail(loancif,1) If newemail = "" Then canceladdemail loanport, loanref Else OptionFlagS = "2" NLSapp.AddModificationHistory 1, loanref, curremail1,newemail, "Primary Email" NLSapp.AddModificationHistory 0, loancifno, curremail1,newemail, "Primary Email (from loan detail1)" End If Else canceladdemail loanport, loanref Exit sub End if End if End If
xmlstrng1 = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <CIF UpdateFlag =""1"" CIFNumber = """ & loancif & """>" & chr(13) & _ " <CIFDETAIL " & cifboxchecked & " = """ & boxvalue & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </CIF>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>" xmlstrng2 = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag = ""1"" AcctRefno =""" & loanref & """ >" & chr(13) & _ " <COMMUNICATION>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType=""Statement"" OptionFlags=""" & OptionFlagS & """/> " & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " </COMMUNICATION> " & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
' " '<ALERT AlertType=""LateNotice"" OptionFlags=""" & OptionFlagL & """/> " & chr(13) & _
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
ImportXML(xmlstrng1) ImportXML(xmlstrng2) End Sub 'On Field Refresh 'On Initialize 'On Button click 'Form Level Script------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before save 'Before Activate 'Before Create 'On Delete 'After Save 'After Create 'On Add Button Clicked 'Local Functions

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="AmortXML" Script="amortxml = NLSApp.AmortizationScheduleAsXML(NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO"))
NLSApp.MessageBox(amortxml)"/> <BUTTON Name="FFLS 287 onetine" Script="commenttext = "Emailed Attacthed disclosure document sent via Sendgrid 10/31/2017." newtwxt = "Emailed Attached disclosure document sent via Sendgrid 10/31/2017" commentupdatesql = "Select 0; update loanacct_comments set comments = '" & newtwxt & "' where comments like '%Emailed Attacthed disclosure document sent via Sendgrid 10/31/2017%' "
'NLSapp.MessageBox(commentupdatesql) 'NLSapp.sqlselectstatement(commentupdatesql) msgbox("Completed.")"/> <BUTTON Name="Set CurrInt to Zero" Script="loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") 'currint = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CURRINTAMT") currint = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT current_interest_balance from loanacct where acctrefno = " & loanrefno ) currpayoff = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT current_payoff_balance from loanacct where acctrefno = " & loanrefno )
If loanrefno = "" Then loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO") End If
If Not currint < .02 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Current interest on this loan is $" & Round( currint,2) & " and is above the allowable threshhold for this opperation." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "The opperation has been cancelled.") Else If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Current Interest on this loan is $" & currint & "." & chr(13) & "Are you sure you want to Set interest balance on this loan to ZERO?") Then ZeroCurrentInt(loanrefno) NLSApp.MessageBox("Interest set to zero.") Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Interest unchanged.") end If End if
If Not currpayoff < .02 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Current Pay Off on this loan is $" & Round(currpayoff,2) & " and is above the allowable threshhold for this opperation." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "The opperation has been cancelled.") Else If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Current Pay Off on this loan is $" & currpayoff & "." & chr(13) & "Are you sure you want to Set total balance on this loan to ZERO?") Then ZeroCurrentpayOff(loanrefno) NLSApp.MessageBox("Pay Off set to zero.") Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Pay Off unchanged.") end If End if
Function ZeroCurrentInt(refno)
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET current_interest_balance = 0 where acctrefno = " & refno)
End Function
Function ZeroCurrentpayOff(refno)
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET current_payoff_balance = 0 where acctrefno = " & refno)
End Function"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###**'Field Level Script----------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before Input 'After Input 'When Field Changes '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ' Detail 2 UDF45 update - This is triggered by the When Field Changes event ' ' Location of script: Loan Detail 1 UDF16(C+) and Loan Detail 1 UDF29(F+) Field label name Investor sale date ' ' Purpose: ' Designed to maintain detail2 udef45 in sync with loan ach_co set up for the purpose of assuring the webpaay portal can see the current code for each new online reqiest. ' ' Created: 07/18/2017 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History NA
class_2 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CLASS2") port = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") ACH_no = ACHCoIDUDF45(class_2,port) Curr_ACH_Co_UDF45 = NLSApp.GetField ("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF45") If ACH_no <> Curr_ACH_Co_UDF45 Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF45", ACH_no End If

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**CurrentDate = Now() NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF6", CurrentDate
'Script to update credit bureau loan account reporting based on loan status changes.
LoanNo = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") StatusCat = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF9") lastupdate = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF6") loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") statuscode = NLSApp.GetField("STATUS_CODE")
NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF6", Now()
XMLA = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?><NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" XMLB = "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=" & chr(34) & LoanNo & chr(34) & ">"
Select Case StatusCat Case "Deceased Confirmed" XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU ECOACode=""X""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" Case "BK Chpt 7 Confirmed" XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU AccountStatus="""" ConsumerInfoIndicator=""A "" ECOACode=""""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" Case "BK Chpt 13 Confirmed" XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU AccountStatus="""" ConsumerInfoIndicator=""D "" ECOACode=""""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" Case "Fraud Confirmed" XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU AccountStatus=""DF"" ConsumerInfoIndicator="" "" ECOACode=""""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" Case Else XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU AccountStatus="""" ConsumerInfoIndicator="" "" ECOACode=""""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" End Select
xmlstrng = XMLA & XMLB & XMLC
NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF7",xmlstrng
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
'xmlstrng = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF7") 'lastupdate = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF6") 'loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") 'StatusCat = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF9")
'IF Not lastupdate = Null Then ' If loanstatus = "CLOSED" Then ' IF DateValue(lastupdate) = DateValue(Now) Then If StatusCat = "Deceased Confirmed" Or StatusCat = "BK Chpt 7 Confirmed" Or StatusCat = "BK Chpt 13 Confirmed" Or StatusCat = "Fraud Confirmed" Then ImportXML(xmlstrng) End If ' End If ' End If 'End If
Function ImportXML(xml) NLSApp.ClearErrorString()
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then NLSApp.MessageBox(xml & CHR(13) & NLSApp.GetErrorString()) End If ImportXML = NLSApp.GetErrorString() & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else ' NLSApp.MessageBox("ECOA Status Updated.") ImportXML = "" End If End Function**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'LOAN variables loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") loannumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") getmodtype = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF5") loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
'Task variables templateno = 7 'LOAN MODIFICATION II defaultstatusno = 7 'STARTED
'Change Start a Loan Modification Request field (UDF5) back to default "Choose an Option" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF5", "Choose an Option" NLSApp.RefreshScreen()
If Not getmodtype = "Choose an Option" Then If addloanMod(getmodtype, loanrefno, loanstatus) = "" Then End If End If NLSApp.SaveScreen()
Function addloanMod(modtype, loanrefno, status)
'TASK variables currate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(7,2),current_interest_rate))+'%' from loanacct where acctrefno = " & loanrefno) currpmt = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT '$' + convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(9,2), next_payment_total_amount)) from loanacct_payment where acctrefno = " & loanrefno) currdate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select convert(char(10),getdate(),111)") currdatetime = NOW()
'User input for modification requestor Options a. borrower, b. co-borrower, c. 3rd party requestpromt = "Who is requesting the " & getmodtype & "?" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "A - Borrower" & chr(13) & "B - Co-Borrower" & chr(13) & "C - Third party" requestorcode = InputBox(requestpromt, "Requestor", "A")
'Borrower/Co-borrower detail sql lookups borrowerlookupsql = "select mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + city + ' ' + state + ', ' + zip from cif c, loanacct l where l.cifno = c.cifno and l.acctrefno = " & loanrefno coborrowerlookupsql = "select mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + city + ' ' + state + ', ' + zip from cif c, cif_loan_relationship clr where clr.cifno = c.cifno and clr.acctrefno = " & loanrefno
'Previous approved deferral lookup prevdeflookupsql = "SELECT count(t.task_refno) from task t, task_detail td where t.task_refno = td.task_refno AND t.status_code_id = 8 AND t.task_template_no = 7 AND td.userdef01 = 'Deferral' AND t.NLS_refno = " & loanrefno
Select Case requestorcode Case "A", "a" requestor = "Borrower" requestordetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(borrowerlookupsql) Case "B", "b" requestor = "Co-Borrower" requestordetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(coborrowerlookupsql) If requestordetail = "" Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Co-Borrower information cannot be located." & chr(13) & "Please validate that Co-borrower exists and Retry.") NLSApp.MessageBox("Operation Canceled.") Exit Function End If Case "C", "c" requestor = "Third_Party (See Notes)" requestordetail = "ENTER 3rd Party details here." Case "" NLSApp.MessageBox("Modification Canceled.") Exit Function Case Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Invalid Selection." & chr(13) & "Please Try Again.") Exit Function End Select
'If Mod Type is a deferral look up the # of previously approved deferrals If getmodtype = "Deferral" Then prevdefs = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(prevdeflookupsql) Else prevdefs = "" End If
'TASK OBJECT CREATION If status = "ACTIVE" Then Set Task = NLSApp.Tasks.New(templateno) NLSApp.Tasks.BeginTransaction Task.StatusCodeID = defaultstatusno Task.NLSRefno = loanrefno Task.UDF1 = modtype Task.UDF9 = prevdefs Task.UDF10 = currpmt Task.UDF12 = currdate Task.UDF14 = currate Task.UDF18 = requestor Task.UDF23 = currdate Task.UDF25 = requestordetail
If (Task.Save = -1) Then NLSApp.Tasks.RollbackTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Task not created.") addloanMod = -1 Else NLSApp.Tasks.CommitTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Loan Modification TASK created." & Chr(13) & "Please go the the Task Tab to complete the modification record.") addloanMod = "" End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("The Loan must be in ACTIVE status to add a Modification task") End If
End Function**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="" Script="PastDue = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DAYSPASTDUE") ITP = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF10") CurrentDate = Now()
If PastDue = 0 Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","CURRENT" End If If (PastDue > 0) AND (PastDue <= 10) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","0-10" End If If (PastDue > 10) AND (PastDue <= 30) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","11+" End If If (PastDue > 30) AND (PastDue <= 60) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","30+" End If If (PastDue > 60) AND (PastDue <= 90) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","60+" End If If (PastDue > 90) AND (PastDue <= 119) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","90+" End If If (PastDue > 119) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","120+" End If
If (PastDue > 0) AND (PastDue <= 10) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF2","N/A" End If If (PastDue > 11) AND (PastDue <= 120) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF2","Collections" End If If (PastDue > 120) AND (ITP = "NO") Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF2","Defaulted" End If If (PastDue > 120) AND (ITP <> "NO") Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF2","Collections" End If"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

Sub PrivacyStatements() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Privacy Statement Maintainance - Looks up qualifying loans due an annual Privacy statement notice and send email notice '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
cifnosql = "SELECT TOP 5 convert(varchar(10),privstmntsDue.cifno) as cifno,privstmntsDue.cifnumber,privstmntsDue.loan_number," & chr(13) & _ "privstmntsDue.Name,convert(char(1),privstmntsDue.portfolio_code_id) as portfolio_code_id,privstmntsDue.email,privstmntsDue.email2," & chr(13) & _ "convert(varchar(10),privstmntsDue.acctrefno)" & chr(13) & _ "from " & chr(13) & _ "(SELECT cif.cifnumber,cif.cifno,la.loan_number,la.acctrefno," & chr(13) & _ "'OptOut' = CASE " & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN CASE WHEN cd.userdef07 = 1 THEN cd.userdef07 ELSE 0 END" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN CASE WHEN cd.userdef03 = 1 THEN cd.userdef03 ELSE 0 END" & chr(13) & _ "ELSE 'NA' END,cif.firstname1+' '+cif.lastname1 as Name," & chr(13) & _ "'lastSent' = cd.userdef04, dateadd(yy,datediff(yy,la.open_date,getdate()), la.open_date) as aniversary," & chr(13) & _ "cif.email,cif.email2,'Borrower' as type, la.portfolio_code_id,cif.street_address1,cif.street_address2,cif.state,cif.zip" & chr(13) & _ "FROM cif cif,cif_detail cd,loanacct la" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.cifno = cif.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "AND cif.cifno = cd.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.current_payoff_balance > 0" & chr(13) & _ "AND (cif.email IS NOT NULL OR (cif.email IS NULL AND cif.email2 IS NOT NULL))" & chr(13) & _ "UNION" & chr(13) & _ "/*loan relationships (co-borrowers)*/" & chr(13) & _ "SELECT cif.cifnumber,cif.cifno,la.loan_number,la.acctrefno," & chr(13) & _ "CASE " & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN CASE WHEN cd.userdef07 = 1 THEN cd.userdef07 ELSE 0 END " & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN CASE WHEN cd.userdef03 = 1 THEN cd.userdef03 ELSE 0 END " & chr(13) & _ "ELSE 'NA' END,cif.firstname1+' '+cif.lastname1 as Name," & chr(13) & _ "'last Sent' = cd.userdef04, dateadd(yy,datediff(yy,la.open_date,getdate()), la.open_date) ," & chr(13) & _ "cif.email,cif.email2,'Co-Borrower',la.portfolio_code_id,cif.street_address1,cif.street_address2,cif.state,cif.zip" & chr(13) & _ "FROM cif cif,cif_detail cd,loanacct la" & chr(13) & _ ",cif_loan_relationship clr" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE clr.cifno = cif.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "AND cif.cifno = cd.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "AND clr.acctrefno = la.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.current_payoff_balance > 0" & chr(13) & _ "AND (cif.email IS NOT NULL OR (cif.email IS NULL AND cif.email2 IS NOT NULL))" & chr(13) & _ ") privstmntsDue" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE " & chr(13) & _ "(lastsent IS NULL AND aniversary < convert(char(8),getdate(),1)) " & chr(13) & _ "OR (aniversary < convert(char(8),getdate(),1) AND lastsent < dateadd(yy,-1,getdate()))" & chr(13) & _ "AND OptOut = 0" & chr(13) & _ "order by privstmntsDue.loan_number"
Cifno1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(cifnosql)
If Cifno1 = "" Then Cifno1 = "***END OF RESULT***" End If Lcount = 0
Do Until Cifno1 = "***END OF RESULT***"
'NLSApp.MessageBox(Cifno1) cifnum = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() loannumb = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() name = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() portcode = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() email1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() email2 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() acctrefno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If portcode = "1" Then portstring1 = "Consolidation" linkstring1 = "https://www.consolplus.com/privacy-notice" emailstring1 = "myloan@consolplus.com" phonestring1 = "1-888-950-4829" emailfromaddr = "consolplus-servicing@consolplus.com" serverName = "Servicing CPlus"
Else portstring1 = "Freedom" linkstring1 = "http://www.freedomplus.com/data/privacy_notice.pdf" emailstring1 = "customersupport@freedomplus.com" phonestring1 = "1-800-297-58799" emailfromaddr = "customersupport@freedomplus.com" serverName = "Servicing FPlus"
End If
If len(email1) > 0 Then emailtoaddr = email1 Else emailtoaddr = email2 End If '**Uncomment next row for testing with real email address. Add comment for go-live 'emailtoaddr = "stanley.muhammad@gmail.com"
subjectstring1 = "Your " & portstring1 & " Plus Privacy statement is now available online" emailbody1 = "Your " & portstring1 & " Plus Privacy statement is now available online." & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ chr(13) & _ "Dear " & name & "," & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "Customer privacy and security have never been more important. We want you to know what we are doing to protect your privacy and to keep " & _ "information about you secure. By following this link (" & linkstring1 & ") you will find our current Privacy Policy, which describes how we protect the privacy of your " & _ "information, what information we may share with others, and your right to limit the sharing and use of information that we may have about you. We " & _ "believe the responsible use of information is an important part of meeting your needs and providing consistent service. " & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "You are receiving this notice as part of our annual Privacy Notice requirement. Please read the privacy notice carefully. If you previously submitted " & _ "your privacy choices, your preferences still apply and you don't have to take any other actions unless you'd like to make changes. " & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "If you have any questions about our privacy notice, please contact us anytime via email " & emailstring1 & ", or by telephone at " & phonestring1 & "." & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "Sincerely," & chr(13) & _ chr(13) & "Diane Sanders" & chr(13) & _ chr(13) & "Operations Manager, Client Services" & chr(13) & _ chr(13) & "Freedom Financial Asset Management, LLC" emailbody2 = "A PRIVACY STATEMENT IS NOW DUE FOR LOAN # " & loannumb & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & _ "HOWEVER, THIS LOAN HAS NOT OPTED FOR PAPER STATEMENTS AND THE CURRENT EMAIL ADDRESS ON FILE IS NOT VALID." & chr(13) & _ "PLEASE PRINT AND MAIL A COPY OF THE PRIVACY STATEMENT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE." & chr(13) & "OR" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE THE BORROWER RECORD WITH A VALID EMAIL ADDRESS." emailbody3 = "A PRIVACY STATEMENT IS NOW DUE FOR LOAN # " & loannumb & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & _ "THIS LOAN HAS OPTED FOR PAPER STATEMENTS ONLY." & CHR(13) & _ "PLEASE PRINT AND MAIL A COPY OF THE PRIVACY STATEMENT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE."
NLSApp.SendEmailMessage serverName, emailtoaddr, emailfromaddr, subjectstring1, emailbody1
cmmnttext = "SENT TO: " & emailtoaddr & chr(13) & "SENT FROM: " & emailfromaddr & chr(13) & "NOTICE TEXT: " & chr(13) & emailbody1
cifXML = "<NLS><CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=" & chr(34) & cifnum & chr(34) & "><CIFDETAIL CIFDetail4=" & chr(34) & NOW() & chr(34) & "/></CIF></NLS>" cmmntxml = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?>" & chr(13) & "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & acctrefno & """>" & chr(13) & _ "<LOANCOMMENTS Comment=""" & cmmnttext & """ Category=""SERVICING NOTES"" CommentDescription=""Privacy Notice Email""/>" & chr(13) & _ "</LOAN>" & chr(13) & "</NLS>"
ImportXML(cifXML) ImportXML(cmmntxml)
Cifno1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Lcount = Lcount + 1 Loop
If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "Privacy Statement Processing", "Statements Processed - " & Lcount 'NLSApp.MessageBox("Loans Processed " & Lcount) End If
End Sub
Sub ACHCompanyUDF() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'ACH Company UDF Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' refnosql = "SELECT TOP 5 nonachUDFs.acctrefno,nonachUDFs.UDFtarget" & chr(13) & _ "FROM" & chr(13) & _ "(SELECT distinct " & chr(13) & _ "convert(varchar(10),la.acctrefno) as acctrefno," & chr(13) & _ "la.loan_class2_no," & chr(13) & _ "lach.ach_company_id," & chr(13) & _ "la.portfolio_code_id,ld2.userdef45," & chr(13) & _ "'UDFtarget'= CASE" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 2 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN 1" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 2 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN 4" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 4 THEN 3" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 7 THEN 7" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 8 THEN 8" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 9 THEN 9" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 10 THEN 10" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 11 THEN 11" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 12 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN 12" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 12 AND la.portfolio_code_id = 1 THEN 15" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 13 THEN 13" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 15 THEN 16" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 16 THEN 17" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 17 THEN 18" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 18 THEN 19" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 19 THEN 20" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 20 THEN 21" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 21 THEN 22" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 22 THEN 23" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 23 THEN 24" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN la.loan_class2_no = 24 THEN 25" & chr(13) & _ "ELSE 9999" & chr(13) & _ "END" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct_ach lach, loanacct_detail_2 ld2, loanacct la, loan_class lc,ach_company ach" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE lach.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND lc.codenum = la.loan_class2_no" & chr(13) & _ "AND lach.ach_company_id = ach.ach_company_id" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "and lach.status = 0" & chr(13) & _ "/*AND la.loan_class1_no 1*/) nonachUDFs" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE nonachUDFs.UDFtarget <> nonachUDFs.userdef45 " & chr(13) & _ "OR nonachUDFs.userdef45 IS NULL"
LoanRefNo = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(refnosql) 'NLSApp.MessageBox( LoanRefNo)
If LoanRefNo = "" Then LoanRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Lcount = 0
Do Until LoanRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***" Lcount = Lcount + 1 achid = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
achxml = "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & LoanRefNo & """>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined45=""" & achid & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(achxml)
LoanRefNo = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "ACH Company UDF Proccessing", "Loans Processed " & Lcount 'NLSApp.MessageBox("Loans Processed " & Lcount) End If
End Sub
Sub LoanCommPrefs() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Communication Preferences Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' Commsetuplookupsqltxt = "SELECT distinct TOP 5 la.loan_number, convert(varchar(15),la.acctrefno) as acctrefno," & chr(13) & _ "convert(char(1),lcp.StatementOptionFlags),lca.Address," & chr(13) & _ "'MailOptIn' = CASE When la.portfolio_code_id=0 THEN ld1.userdef18" & chr(13) & _ "When la.portfolio_code_id=1 THEN ld1.userdef17 END," & chr(13) & _ "cif.email, cif.cifnumber" & chr(13) & _ "from cif cif, loanacct_detail ld1,loanacct la" & chr(13) & _ "left outer join" & chr(13) & _ "LoanCommunicationPreferences lcp" & chr(13) & _ "on " & chr(13) & _ "la.acctrefno = lcp.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "left outer join" & chr(13) & _ "LoanCommunicationAddress lca" & chr(13) & _ "on" & chr(13) & _ "lca.LoanCommunicationPreferencesID = lcp.LoanCommunicationPreferencesID" & chr(13) & _ "Where ld1.acctrefno = la.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND cif.cifno = la.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0" & chr(13) & _ "AND ((lcp.StatementOptionFlags IS NULL AND (CASE When la.portfolio_code_id=0 THEN ld1.userdef18" & chr(13) & _ "When la.portfolio_code_id=1 THEN ld1.userdef17 END)= 0)" & chr(13) & _ "OR (lcp.StatementOptionFlags = 2 AND lca.Address IS NULL)" & chr(13) & _ "OR (lcp.StatementOptionFlags = 1 AND (CASE When la.portfolio_code_id=0 THEN ld1.userdef18" & chr(13) & _ "When la.portfolio_code_id=1 THEN ld1.userdef17 END)= 0) )" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.loan_number not like 'CP%A' " & chr(13) & _ "AND la.loan_number not like '%dummy%'" & chr(13) & _ "order by acctrefno ,mailoptin desc"
LoanNumber = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Commsetuplookupsqltxt) loopcnt = 0
If LoanNumber = "" Then LoanNumber = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Lcount = 0
Do Until LoanNumber = "***END OF RESULT***"
Loanrefno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Flag = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Commemail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Optin = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Cntemail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If Optin = 1 Then Optinflag = 1 Else Optinflag = 2 End If CIFNum = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If Cntemail = "" Then Optinflag = 1 Cntemail = "LScontact@ffn.com" cifemailxml = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & CIFNum & """ Entity=""INDIVIDUAL"" EmailAddress1=""LScontact@ffn.com""/>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(cifemailxml)
End If
commprefxml = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""UTF-8"" standalone=""yes""?>" & chr(13) & _ "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & LoanNumber & """>" & chr(13) & _ " <COMMUNICATION>" & chr(13) & _ " <EMAILADDRESSES>" & chr(13) & _ " <EMAILADDRESS Operation=""ADD"" Address=""" & Cntemail & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </EMAILADDRESSES>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType=""Statement"" OptionFlags=""" & Optinflag & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " </COMMUNICATION>" & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
'NLSApp.MessageBox(loopcnt & " - " & LoanNumber)
ImportXML(commprefxml) LoanNumber = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Lcount = Lcount + 1 Loop
If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "Loan Comm Prefs Proccessing", "Loans Processed " & Lcount ' NLSApp.MessageBox( "Loans Processed " & Lcount) End If End Sub
Sub WebPayments() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Web payments Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'SET PENDING STATUSES-----------------------------------------------------------
sqlstring1 = "select TOP 5 convert(varchar(10),la.acctrefno) as acctrefno, pt.ach_trace_number,'PENDING' as Status,ld2.userdef41,null" & chr(13) & _ "FROM pending_transactions pt, loanacct la, loanacct_detail_2 ld2" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.acctrefno = pt.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND ld2.userdef35 = 'SUBMITTED'" & chr(13) & _ "AND convert(datetime,ld2.userdef41) = pt.effective_date" & chr(13) & _ "UNION" & chr(13) & _ "select convert(varchar(10),la.acctrefno) as acctrefno, lph.ach_trace_number,'COMPLETED', ld2.userdef41,lph.date_paid" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct_payment_history lph, loanacct la, loanacct_detail_2 ld2" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.acctrefno = lph.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.acctrefno = ld2.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND ld2.userdef35 = 'SUBMITTED'" & chr(13) & _ "AND convert(datetime,ld2.userdef41) = lph.date_paid" & chr(13) & _ "UNION" & chr(13) & _ "select convert(varchar(10),ld2.acctrefno) ,null,'COMPLETED',ld2.userdef41,lph.date_paid" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct_payment_history lph, loanacct_detail_2 ld2 " & chr(13) & _ "WHERE ld2.acctrefno = lph.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "AND ld2.userdef35 = 'PENDING' " & chr(13) & _ "AND ld2.userdef34 =lph.ach_trace_number" & chr(13) & _ "AND convert(datetime,ld2.userdef41) = lph.date_paid"
LoanRefNo = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(sqlstring1)
If LoanRefNo = "" Then LoanRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***" End If Lcount = 0 Do Until LoanRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***"
achtrace = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() status = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If status = "PENDING" Then
xmlstrng1 = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?>" & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & LoanRefNo & """>" & _ " <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined34=""" & achtrace & """ UserDefined35=""" & status & """ />" & _ " </LOAN>" & _ "</NLS>" End If
If status = "COMPLETED" Then
xmlstrng1 = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?>" & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & LoanRefNo & """>" & _ " <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined35=""" & status & """ />" & _ " </LOAN>" & _ "</NLS>" End If
'NLSApp.MessageBox(xmlstrng1)
'XML Imports ImportXML(xmlstrng1)
LoanRefNo = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Lcount = Lcount + 1 Loop If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "Web Payments", "Loans Processed " & Lcount End If End Sub
Sub LateFees1() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' '1st late fee Maintainance - Reverses any late fees charged prior to acct 11 days past due ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' Trandatasql = "select distinct TOP 5 la.loan_number,lth.date_due,lth.transaction_date,lth.effective_date," & chr(13) & _ "datediff(dd,lth.date_due,getdate()) as days,la.days_past_due," & chr(13) & _ "convert(varchar(10),lth.transrefno) as transrefno,lth.transaction_amount" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct la, loanacct_trans_history lth " & chr(13) & _ "where la.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and lth.transaction_code = 150" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.days_past_due between 1 and 12 " & chr(13) & _ "AND datediff(dd,lth.date_due,getdate()) between 1 and 11" & chr(13) & _ "AND lth.transaction_date > '12/22/16'" & CHR(13) & _ "AND lth.reversal_transrefno = 0"
loannumb = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Trandatasql)
If loannumb = "" Then loannumb = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Lcount = 0
Do Until loannumb = "***END OF RESULT***" duedate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() transdate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() effdate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() pmtdpd = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() lndpd = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() transrefno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() amount = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
revtransxml = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8""?>" & chr(13) & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ " <TRANSACTIONS>" & chr(13) & _ " <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode=""151"" EffectiveDate=""" & effdate & """ LoanNumber=""" & loannumb & """ Amount=""" & amount & """ DateDue=""" & duedate & """ TransactionDate=""" & transdate & """ TransRefNo=""" & transrefno & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </TRANSACTIONS>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(revtransxml)
loannumb = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Lcount = Lcount + 1 Loop If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "Late Fee Processing", "Late Fees reversed - " & Lcount End If
End Sub
Sub PDFP() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'PDFP Maintainance ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' TranRefNosql = "SELECT TOP 5 convert(varchar(12),lth.transrefno),lth.transaction_date," & chr(13) & _ "lth.effective_date,lth.date_due,la.current_suspense,la.loan_number" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct la,loanacct_trans_history lth," & chr(13) & _ "(SELECT DISTINCT la.loan_number,max(lth.transaction_date) as transaction_date" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct la,loanacct_trans_history lth WHERE la.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND lth.transaction_code = '124' AND la.current_suspense > 0 AND la.current_suspense = la.total_past_due_balance" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0 AND lth.date_due < getdate() group by la.loan_number) lt" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND lt.loan_number = la.loan_number" & chr(13) & _ "AND lt.transaction_date = lth.transaction_date" & chr(13) & _ "AND lth.transaction_code = '124' " & chr(13) & _ "UNION " & chr(13) & _ "SELECT distinct convert(varchar(12),lth.transrefno),lth.transaction_date," & chr(13) & _ "lth.effective_date,lth.date_due,la.total_past_due_balance,la.loan_number" & chr(13) & _ "FROM loanacct la,loanacct_trans_history lth, loanacct_payments_due lpd" & chr(13) & _ "WHERE la.acctrefno = lth.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND lpd.payment_reference_no = lth.transaction_reference_no" & chr(13) & _ "AND lth.transaction_code = '124'" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.status_code_no = 0 " & chr(13) & _ "AND la.total_past_due_balance between .000010 and .01"
TranRefNo = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(TranRefNosql)
If TranRefNo = "" Then TranRefNo = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Lcount = 0
Do Until TranRefNo ="***END OF RESULT***"
transdate = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() effdate = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() duedate = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() amount = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() loannum = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
revtransxml = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8""?>" & chr(13) & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ " <TRANSACTIONS>" & chr(13) & _ " <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode=""125"" EffectiveDate=""" & effdate & """ LoanNumber=""" & loannum & """ Amount=""" & amount & """ DateDue=""" & duedate & """ TransactionDate=""" & transdate & """ TransRefNo=""" & TranRefNo & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </TRANSACTIONS>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(revtransxml)
TranRefNo = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() Lcount = Lcount + 1 Loop
If Lcount > 0 Then NLSapp.AddNotification 0, 0, CDate(NOW()), 0, "PDFP Proccessing", "Loans Processed " & Lcount End if End Sub**###Before Save###****###Before Activate###**pastdue = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DAYSPASTDUE") If pastdue = "" then pastdue = 0 end if udf18 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF18") acctrefno = NLSApp.GetField ("LOAN_REFNO") POAststatussql = "Select distinct l.acctrefno from loanacct l, loanacct_statuses ls where l.acctrefno = ls.acctrefno and ls.status_code_no = 39 and l.acctrefno = " & acctrefno POAstatus = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(POAststatussql) POABox = NLSApp.GetField ("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF18") ValidPOAYN = POADocExists(acctrefno) NLSapp.SetToolTip "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF51", "Right Click to add a new row."
If pastdue >= 120 Then NLSapp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF4", false Else NLSapp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF4", true End If
'--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- If right(NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF37"),9) = "COMPLETED" THEN NLSapp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF44", False Else NLSapp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF44", True End If
If len(groupno) > 0 Then
If groupno = 11 or Userno = 39 Then NLSapp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF14", false NLSapp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF19", false NLSapp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF19", true End If
End if
PrepTransitionLet()
Sub PrepTransitionLet() '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Prepare Transition Letter 'Event- Before activate '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- loanref = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") prepyesno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF48") WCcalledyesno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF37") Currmatdate = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_MATURITYDATE") Currmatdate49 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF49")
If Currmatdate <> Currmatdate49 Then loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
strSQL2 = "select la.loan_number, la.curr_maturity_date, lp.first_principal_payment_date" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct la, loanacct_payment lp " & chr(13) & _ "where la.acctrefno = lp.acctrefno" & chr(13) & _ "AND la.acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'"
loannumber = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL2) maturity = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() FirstPayment = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() TotalPayments = NLSapp.AmortizeLoanInMemory(maturity, loanref)
NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF47", TotalPayments NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF48", FirstPayment NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF49", maturity NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF50", loannumber NLSApp.SaveScreen()
End If End Sub
'---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Userno = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo( ) userauthsql = "select convert(varchar(3),groupno) from nlsgroupmembers where groupno in ('11') and userno = " & Userno
groupno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(userauthsql) 'NLSApp.MessageBox(groupno)
If len(groupno) > 0 Then If groupno = 11 Then NLSapp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF14", false
End If End If
'--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Settlement and POA Maintenance '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'MAINTAIN POA Check box brokenyn = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT distinct convert(varchar(12),acctrefno) from loanacct_statuses where status_code_no IN (34, 38) and acctrefno = " & acctrefno ) 'Check POA box if POA exist and box is not checked If ValidPOAYN = "Y" and Not POABox = "CHECK" Then If not brokenyn = acctrefno Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF18", "CHECK" End if End if
'UnCheck POA box if no POA exist and box is checked If (not ValidPOAYN = "Y" or brokenyn = acctrefno) and POABox = "CHECK" Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF18","UNCHECK" End if
'Validate POA and loan Status If not POAstatus = "" Then If ValidPOAYN = "Y" Then NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", True NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", True NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23", True 'NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF51", True
Else POAmissingNote = "Loan has 'POA RECEIVED' status, however the required documentation is missing in comments!" & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "Please go to the Comments Tab and upload a copy of the documentation." & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "It MUST be saved in the DOCUMENTS category and Settlement POA must be selected from the Reason Code drop-down list." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Thank you." NLSApp.MessageBox(POAmissingNote) NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", false NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", false NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23", false 'NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF51", false
End if
Else DSinputisnull = NLSApp.GetField ("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21") & NLSApp.GetField ("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22") & NLSApp.GetField ("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23") ' If Not DSinputisnull = "" Then ' NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", "" ' NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", "" ' NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23", "" ' End If
NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", false NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", false NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23", false 'NLSApp.EnableFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF51", false
End if
NLSapp.SetToolTip "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF51", "Right Click to add a new row." **###Before Activate###****###Before Create###****###Before Create###****###On Delete###****###On Delete###****###After Save###**acctrefno = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_REFNO") WCAgent= NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF37") udf18 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF18")
If right(WCAgent,9) = "COMPLETED" THEN NLSapp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF44", False End If
If udf18 = "CHECK" Then NLSApp.HideFields "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF20", False
End if
userid = REPLACE( NLSApp.GetSignedOnID(),"NLS.LOCAL\","") acctrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
newbalchecksql = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select left(cd.userdef27,95) from cif_detail cd, cif c where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'DEBT SETTLEMENT TASK'") newDSbalcheck = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(newbalchecksql & acctrefno)
If newDSbalcheck <> "" then newbaleditsqlpart1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select cd.userdef04 from cif_detail cd, cif c where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'DEBT SETTLEMENT TASK'") newbaleditsqlpart2 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select cd.userdef03 from cif_detail cd, cif c where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'DEBT SETTLEMENT TASK'") newDSbaledit = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(newbaleditsqlpart1 & userid & newbaleditsqlpart2 & acctrefno) newDSbaledit = Replace(newDSbaledit,"""","'")
XMLstring = "<NLS><LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & acctrefno & """><LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined51=""" & newDSbaledit & """/></LOAN></NLS>"
ImportXML(XMLstring) NLSApp.RefreshScreen() End if **###After Save###****###After Create###****###After Create###****###On Transaction Entry###****###On Transaction Entry###****###After Transaction Entry###**loanpayoff = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_CURRPAYOFF") 'NextRun = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT substring(cd.userdef03,11,25) FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'AUTO WRITEOFFCLOSE'") ' ' If CDate(NextRun) < CDate(Now()) Then ' NextRuntime = NOW() + 1 ' SetNextRun = "SELECT 0; UPDATE cif_detail SET userdef03 = 'Next Run: " & NextRuntime & "' FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'AUTO WRITEOFFCLOSE'" ' NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(SetNextRun) ' ' AutoWOaddCompletePending() ' AutoCloseaddCompleted() ' ' NextRuntime = NOW() ' SetNextRun = "SELECT 0; UPDATE cif_detail SET userdef03 = 'Next Run: " & NextRuntime & "' FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'AUTO WRITEOFFCLOSE'" ' NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(SetNextRun) ' ' End If
