commprefidsql = "select Distinct convert(varchar,lcp.LoanCommunicationPreferencesID)" & chr(13) & _ "from cif c,loanacct l, LoanCommunicationPreferences lcp" & chr(13) & _ "where l.cifno = c.cifno and l.acctrefno = lcp.acctrefno and c.cifnumber = '" & contactnum & "'" 'NLSApp.MessageBox(commprefidsql) commprefid = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(commprefidsql) 'NLSApp.MessageBox(commprefidsql) Do eaddress = InputBox("Please enter a valid email address.","New Email" & emailno, "some.thing@somewhere.com") ' email format check exchnage = InStrRev(eaddress, "@") domain = InStrRev(eaddress, ".")
If (Not exchnage = 0 and Not domain = 0) And (exchnage < domain) Then
If emailno = 1 Then addressedits1 = "SELECT 0; UPDATE cif SET email = '" & eaddress & "' where cifnumber = '" & contactnum & "'" & chr(13)& _ "DELETE FROM LoanCommunicationAddress where LoanCommunicationPreferencesID = " & commprefid & chr(13) & _ "INSERT INTO LoanCommunicationAddress Values (" & commprefid & ", '" & eaddress & "', 0)" Else addressedits1 = "SELECT 0; UPDATE cif SET email2 = '" & eaddress & "' where cifnumber = '" & contactnum & "'" & chr(13) End If 'NLSApp.MessageBox(addressedits1) NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement addressedits1 retry = False Else retry = NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Invalid Email format" & chr(10) & chr(10) &"Retry? (Y/N)")
If retry = false Then addnewemail = "" Exit Do End if End if addnewemail = eaddress Loop while retry = True End Function
Sub startnewDSoffer() 'NLSApp.SaveScreen() acctrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") currco = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21") loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") poa = POADocExists(acctrefno) proceednext = 1
If loanstatus = "ACTIVE" Then If poa = "Y" Then If currco <> "" Then addDSofferLOANv2() Else NLSApp.MessageBox("A valid Debt Settlement Company must be selected to Proceed.") proceednext = 0 End If
Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Power of Attorney Documentation has not been recorded." & chr(13) & "Please complete to Proceed.") NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", "" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", "" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23", "" proceednext = 0 End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Invalid account. Loan must be open for Settlement.") NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF18","UNCHECK" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", "" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", "" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23", "" proceednext = 0 End If
End Sub
Sub addDSofferLOANv2() monthtseqtxt = "starting" nextmonthyr = Year(NOW()) nextmonth = Monthtext(month(now())) & " " & nextmonthyr rowno = 0 cifnumb = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER")
'**XML set up ***To avoid loan record locks, The contact record udf grid fields associated with the active loan will be used as a temporary holding place to build the settlement schedule. xxmlheader = "<NLS><CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cifnumb & """ Entity=""INDIVIDUAL"" ><CIFDETAIL CIFDetail51=""<DATA>" xxmlfooter = "</DATA>"" /></CIF></NLS>"
firstpass = True
Do Until firstmonth = "END" '**INPUTS Do If firstpass = True Then firstmonth = InputBox("If the first payment will be in " & nextmonth & " Select [OK]." & chr(13) & "If payments will start another month, Type below." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Select CANCEL To quit.", "Settlement Offer Set Up", nextmonth) Else firstmonth = InputBox("Select [OK] to enter payments starting " & nextmonth & "." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Select [CANCEL] To quit." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Type 'END' to Finish.", "Settlement Offer Set Up", nextmonth) End If
If Not len(firstmonth) = 0 and Not (firstmonth = "END" Or firstmonth = "end" Or firstmonth = "End") Then If DateFormat(firstmonth,10077) = -1 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Invalid Entry or Date Format." & chr(13) & "Please re-enter") End if End If
Loop Until len(firstmonth) = 0 OR IsDate(firstmonth) = True OR (firstmonth = "END" Or firstmonth = "end" Or firstmonth = "End")
firstpass = False
If IsDate(firstmonth) = True Then firstmonth = DateFormat(firstmonth,10077) End if
'Check for select CANCEL If len(firstmonth) = 0 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Canceling.") NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", "" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", "" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23", "" Exit Sub End If
'Check for select END If firstmonth = "END" Or firstmonth = "end" Or firstmonth = "End" Then Endproc = 1 curramount = CStr(totpayments) repeat = 1
Else Endproc = 0 curramount = InputBox("Enter payment amount starting " & firstmonth & ". ", "Settlement Offer Set Up", "0.00") repeat = CDbl(InputBox("Repeat $" & curramount & " payment how many Times? ", "Settlement Offer Set Up", "1"))
'**VARIABLES monthtseqtxt = "Next" nextmonth = firstmonth nextmonthno = MonthNo(firstmonth) nextmonthyr = right(firstmonth, 4) monthstopno = CDbl(nextmonthno) + CDbl(repeat)
End If
'**CREATE SECTION ROWS Do While repeatcnt < repeat repeatcnt = repeatcnt + 1
If Endproc = 1 Then nextgridrow = "<ROW RowNumber='" & rowno & "'><COLUMN Name='' Value=''/><COLUMN Name='Month' Value='TOTAL'/><COLUMN Name='Amount' Value='" & totpayments & "'/></ROW>" Else nextgridrow = "<ROW RowNumber='" & rowno & "'><COLUMN Name='' Value=''/><COLUMN Name='Month' Value='" & nextmonth & "'/><COLUMN Name='Amount' Value='" & curramount & "'/></ROW>" End If
allgridrows = allgridrows & nextgridrow
rowno = rowno + 1
'Check if next month begins a new year If nextmonthno = "12" Then nextmonthno = "1" nextmonthyr = nextmonthyr + 1 nextmonth = "January" & " " & nextmonthyr Else nextmonthno = MonthNo(nextmonth) + 1 nextmonth = Monthtext(MonthNo(nextmonth) + 1) & " " & nextmonthyr End If rowcnt = rowcnt + 1
If rowcnt = 1 Then 'Set default 1st paymentdate
firstpayment = DateForm111(firstmonth) If CDate(firstpayment) < CDate(Now()) Then firstpayment = DateForm111(CDate(firstmonth)+ Day(Now())) End If
End If
totpayments = CDbl(totpayments) + CDbl(curramount)
Loop repeatcnt = 0
xxml = xxmlheader & allgridrows & xxmlfooter
ImportXML(xxml)
If Endproc = 1 Then NLSApp.SaveScreen() Exit Do End If
Loop
'**CREATE TASK If proceednext = "" Then 'TASK variables createuser = NLSApp.GetSignedOnID() loannumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") cifnum = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") coname = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21") repname = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22") reason = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF23") cifudf51 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef51 from cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = '" & cifnum & "'") currbal = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CURRPAYOFF") minbal = 0 currtime = NOW() offer = GetMonthsFromtaskGrid101(cifudf51) & " payments for a total of $" & GetTotalFromtaskGrid101(cifudf51, "Amount") & "." TotalOffer = GetTotalFromtaskGrid101(cifudf51, "Amount") Expiredate = DateForm111(Month(firstpayment) & "/" & DaysInMonth(Month(firstpayment),Year(firstpayment)) & "/" & Year(firstpayment))
Companylookupsql = "select 'Contact ID: ' + cifnumber + ' ' + 'Entry Date: ' + convert(char(11),c.setupdate) + char(13) + char(13) + " & _ "'Name: ' + company + char(13) + char(13) + 'ADDRESS :' + char(13) + mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + " & _ "city + ', ' + state + ' ' + zip + char(13) + char(13) + 'Phone: (' + phone_area_code + ') ' + phone_number + char(13) + char(13) + 'Standard Offer - ' + cast(convert(dec(4,2),cd.userdef01) as varchar) +'%' " & _ "from cif_detail cd, cif c left outer join cif_phone_nums cp on c.cifno = cp.cifno " & _ "where c.cifno = cd.cifno and cp.phone_description = 'Business' and c.company = '" & coname & "'"
workerlookupsql = "select 'Contact ID: ' + cifnumber + ' ' + 'Entry Date: ' + convert(char(11),c.setupdate) + char(13) + char(13) + " & _ "'Name: ' + shortname + char(13) + char(13) + 'EMAIL1 :' + case when email is null then '' else email end + char(13) + " & _ "'EMAIL2 :' + case when email2 is null then '' else email end + char(13) + char(13) + 'Phone: (' + phone_area_code + ') ' + phone_number " & _ "from cif_detail cd, cif c left outer join cif_phone_nums cp on c.cifno = cp.cifno where c.cifno = cd.cifno and cp.phone_description = 'Business' and c.shortname = '" & repname & "'"
coinfo = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(Companylookupsql) repinfo = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(workerlookupsql) useremail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT email FROM NLSusers where signonid = '" & createuser & "'")
'TASK OBJECT CREATION If CDbl(currbal) > minbal Then Set Task = NLSApp.Tasks.New(6) NLSApp.Tasks.BeginTransaction Task.StatusCodeID = 6 Task.NLSRefno = loanrefno Task.WorkQueueCodeID = 4 Task.DueDate = Expiredate Task.UDF1 = coname Task.UDF2 = repname Task.UDF3 = reason Task.UDF4 = 1 Task.UDF5 = currbal Task.UDF6 = offer Task.UDF7 = round(TotalOffer / currbal * 100, 2) Task.UDF8 = currtime Task.UDF9 = firstpayment Task.UDF10 = coinfo Task.UDF12 = repinfo Task.UDF13 = currtime Task.UDF14 = "NEW" Task.UDF15 = useremail Task.UDF101 = cifudf51 If (Task.Save = -1) Then NLSApp.Tasks.RollbackTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Task not created") Else NLSApp.Tasks.CommitTransaction subjectstring1 = "Debt Settlement Task Needs Approval - Loan #" & loannumber emailbody1 = "There is a debt settlement agreement that needs approval. Please review Loan #" & loannumber & " and approve or decline. If approved, please reschedule the terms of the loan." 'serverName = "Servicing CPlus" 'emailtoaddr = "somebody@gmail.com" 'emailfromaddr = "consolplus-servicing@consolplus.com" serverName = "Loan Servicing3" emailtoaddr = "NLSApprovers@freedomfinancialnetwork.com" emailfromaddr = "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com" NLSApp.SendEmailMessage serverName, emailtoaddr, emailfromaddr, subjectstring1, emailbody1 NLSApp.MessageBox("TASK created.") End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Minimum loan balance must be greater than $" & minbal & "." & chr(13) & "Request not submitted.") End If End If End Sub
'--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Port form function #1 'XML Import '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Function ImportXML(xml) NLSApp.ClearErrorString()
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then NLSApp.MessageBox(xml & CHR(13) & NLSApp.GetErrorString()) End If ImportXML = NLSApp.GetErrorString() & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else ' NLSApp.MessageBox("Payment Added") ImportXML = "" End If End Function
Function DateForm111(sourcedate)
If len(DAY(sourcedate)) = 1 Then daytext = "0" & DAY(sourcedate) Else daytext = DAY(sourcedate) End if
If len(MONTH(sourcedate)) = 1 Then mnthtext = "0" & MONTH(sourcedate) Else mnthtext = MONTH(sourcedate) End if
DateForm111 = YEAR(sourcedate)&"/"& mnthtext&"/"& daytext
End Function

Case "3 - FFNAM FUND" achid = "3" Case "4 - RANGER" achid = "7" Case "5 - ATALAYA CAPITAL" achid = "8" Case "6 - RANGER DLT" achid = "9" Case "7 - BLUE ELEPHANT" achid = "10" Case "8 - TIDEPOOL" achid = "11" Case "9 - AEQUITAS ACC5" If portfolio = "PLUS PORTFOLIO" Then achid = "12" Else achid = "15" End If Case "5A - ATALAYA V-B" achid = "13" Case "5B - ATALAYA VI" achid = "14" Case "5C - ATALAYA MW" achid = "16" Case "7A - BLUE ELEPHANT OFFSHO" achid = "17" Case "5D - ATALAYA II-C" achid = "18" Case "10 - KEYSTONE" achid = "19" Case "11 - CRESTLINE" achid = "20" Case "12 - FCCF-SERIES 1" achid = "21" Case "13 - FCCF-SERIES 2" achid = "22" Case "14 - ACM III" achid = "23" Case "15 - ACM MW II" achid = "24" Case "16 - CRESTLINE II" achid = "25" Case "17 - DAKOY" achid = "26" Case "18 - STONERIDGE" achid = "27" Case "19 - ACM ALAMOSA I" achid = "32" Case "20 - ACM ALAMOSA I-A" achid = "28" Case "21 - ACM GATEWAY" achid = "30" Case "22 - ACM F ACQUISITION" achid = "31" Case "23 - 590 CONSUMER LENDING" achid = "29"

Function Monthtext(monthval) mtext = "" Select Case monthval Case "1" mtext = "January" Case "2" mtext = "February" Case "3" mtext = "March" Case "4" mtext = "April" Case "5" mtext = "May" Case "6" mtext = "June" Case "7" mtext = "July" Case "8" mtext = "August" Case "9" mtext = "September" Case "10" mtext = "October" Case "11" mtext = "November" Case "12" mtext = "December" Case Else mtext = "Invalid Month value" End Select Monthtext = mtext End Function
Function MonthNo(monthtxt) mthno = "" Select Case left(monthtxt, 3) Case "Jan" mthno = "1" Case "Feb" mthno = "2" Case "Mar" mthno = "3" Case "Apr" mthno = "4" Case "May" mthno = "5" Case "Jun" mthno = "6" Case "Jul" mthno = "7" Case "Aug" mthno = "8" Case "Sep" mthno = "9" Case "Oct" mthno = "10" Case "Nov" mthno = "11" Case "Dec" mthno = "12" Case Else mthno = "Invalid Month" End Select MonthNo = mthno End Function
Function GetTotalFromtaskGrid101(strXMl, colname) strXMl = Replace(strXMl, "&", "&") Set xmlDoc = CreateObject("Msxml2.DOMDocument") xmlDoc.setProperty "SelectionLanguage", "XPath"
Err.Clear On Error Resume Next xmlDoc.loadxml(strXMl) If Err.Number <> 0 Then 'Exit Function NLSapp.MessageBox(Err.Description) End If On Error GoTo 0
Set nodesList = xmlDoc.documentelement.selectNodes("/DATA/ROW") counter = nodesList.length
dblTotal = 0
For x = 1 To counter
Set currNode=nodesList.nextNode CurrNodeName = currNode.nodename
Set cnode = currNode.childnodes
For Each c In cnode
name = c.getAttribute("Name") value = c.getAttribute("Value")
If name = colname Then dblTotal = dblTotal + value End If
Next Next
GetTotalFromtaskGrid101 = dblTotal / 2 End Function
Function GetmonthsFromtaskGrid101(strXMl) strXMl = Replace(strXMl, "&", "&") Set xmlDoc = CreateObject("Msxml2.DOMDocument") xmlDoc.setProperty "SelectionLanguage", "XPath"
Err.Clear On Error Resume Next xmlDoc.loadxml(strXMl) If Err.Number <> 0 Then 'Exit Function NLSapp.MessageBox(Err.Description) End If On Error GoTo 0
Set nodesList = xmlDoc.documentelement.selectNodes("/DATA/ROW") counter = nodesList.length
GetmonthsFromtaskGrid101 = counter-1 End Function
Function setAdminuser(acctrefno) setAdminuser = -1 'COMMENT UPDATE commentupdatetxt = "Select 0; update loanacct_comments set created_by = 0,userdef01 = 'Outbound',userdef02 = 'Zero Balance Letter',userdef03 = 'Email' " & _ "where comment_description in ('CPLUS ZERO BALANCE LETTER','FPLUS ZERO BALANCE LETTER') " & _ "and created_by <> 0 and created >= left(getdate(),11) and acctrefno IN "
Nlsapp.sqlselectstatement(commentupdatetxt & acctrefno)
'Mod HISTORY UPDATE modhistupdatetxt = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_mod_history SET mod_uid = 0, modification_description = '//VBScript// '+ char(13) + modification_description where row_id IN " modIDlist = "" modsqllookup1 = "SELECT cd.userdef18 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'UIDADMINUPDATES' "
modupdatesql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(modsqllookup1) modID = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(modupdatesql & acctrefno) Do Until modID = "stop"
If modID = "***END OF RESULT***" Then modIDlist = "(" & Left(modIDlist, Len(modIDlist) - 2) & ")" modID = "stop" Else modIDlist = modIDlist & modID & ", " modID = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() End If
Loop
NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(modhistupdatetxt & modIDlist)
'TRANSACTION HISTORY UPDATE transhistupdatetxt = "SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_trans_history SET enteredby_uid = 0, user_reference = '//VBScript//' where transrefno IN " transrefnolist = "" transqllookup2 = "SELECT cd.userdef27 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'UIDADMINUPDATES' "
transupdatesql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(transqllookup2) tranrefno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(transupdatesql & acctrefno) Do Until tranrefno = "stop"
If tranrefno = "***END OF RESULT***" Then transrefnolist = "(" & Left(transrefnolist, Len(transrefnolist) - 2) & ")" tranrefno = "stop" Else transrefnolist = transrefnolist & tranrefno & ", " tranrefno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() End If
Loop NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(transhistupdatetxt & transrefnolist)
setAdminuser = ""
End Function
'DATE FORMATTING--------------------------------------------------------------------
Function DateFormat(datestring,formatcode)
If IsDate(datestring) = true Then If len(DAY(datestring)) = 1 Then daytext = "0" & DAY(datestring) Else daytext = DAY(datestring) End if
If len(MONTH(datestring)) = 1 Then mnthtext = "0" & MONTH(datestring) Else mnthtext = MONTH(datestring) End if
Select case formatcode 'U.S. = mm/dd/yyyy case 1 DateFormat = mnthtext &"/"& daytext &"/"& Right(YEAR(datestring),2)
case 101 DateFormat = mnthtext &"/"& daytext &"/"& YEAR(datestring)
'JAPAN = yyyy/mm/dd case 11 DateFormat = Right(YEAR(datestring),2) &"/"& mnthtext &"/"& daytext case 111 DateFormat = YEAR(datestring)&"/"& mnthtext &"/"& daytext
'Default with Day and timestamp removed = mon yyyy case 10077 DateFormat = MonthName(Month(datestring), False) & " " & YEAR(datestring)
Case Else
DateFormat = -1
End Select
Else
DateFormat = -1
End if
End Function
Function DaysInMonth(monthno,yearno)
Select Case monthno Case 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 10, 12 DaysInMonth = 31
Case 4, 6, 9, 11 DaysInMonth = 30
Case 2 'Is Year a leap year? If (yearno Mod 400 = 0) or (yearno Mod 4 = 0 and not yearno Mod 100 = 0) Then DaysInMonth = 29 Else DaysInMonth = 28 End If End Select
End Function
Function MonthNo(monthtxt) mthno = "" Select Case left(monthtxt, 3) Case "Jan" mthno = "1" Case "Feb" mthno = "2" Case "Mar" mthno = "3" Case "Apr" mthno = "4" Case "May" mthno = "5" Case "Jun" mthno = "6" Case "Jul" mthno = "7" Case "Aug" mthno = "8" Case "Sep" mthno = "9" Case "Oct" mthno = "10" Case "Nov" mthno = "11" Case "Dec" mthno = "12" Case Else mthno = "Invalid Month" End Select MonthNo = mthno End Function**###Local Functions###**
